page.title: 15LIFE-STYLE - CHILDREN 2
page.content: On Wednesday I take my netball kit for games. On Thursday I take my euphonium to play in band. On Friday my class go swimming to Scissett Baths. {School starts at 8.55 a.m.and finishes {at 3.30p.m.}The midday break is from noon to l.10 p.m.Some children have school dinners, some bring sandwiches and a few go home.{MY HOBBIES}are music,story writing,cycling,reading, designing clothes, cooking, playing games and music.I'm interested in ice-skating & crafts.I{DISLIKE snobbish people.{I LIKE}watching T.V. films,serials,&.comedies.{MY FAVOURITE {FOODS}are crispy pancakes,beans & chips with lemonade to drink. {MY {FAVOURITE CLOTHES}are skirts, cord trousers, blouses, pixie boots, sun-tops & Sweaters. {I DO NOT LIKE } midges because they fly round my face tickling me and biting. {Cont'd }
